ingredients.ingredient: 8 heads baby bok choy, trimmed and cut into bite-size pieces

cookingTips: Heat wok or skillet until very hot before adding oil for proper wok hei (breath of the wok)
Add garlic first to infuse oil, then quickly add bok choy to maintain crispness
Stir-fry for 3-4 minutes over high heat until tender-crisp
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How does high heat affect the texture and flavor of bok choy? What's the ideal doneness for this vegetable?
